Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enforcement against cabarets, dance clubs and certain places of public assembly that use security personnel and to include in the nuisance abatement law certain violations of the alcoholic beverage control law and the administrative code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enforcement against cabarets, dance clubs and certain places of public assembly that use security personnel.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enforcement against cabarets, dance clubs and certain places of public assembly that use security personnel and to include in the nuisance abatement law certain violations of the alcoholic beverage control law and the administrative code.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
